cell_0.source:
from line_solver import *
import numpy as np
GlobalConstants.set_verbose(VerboseLevel.SILENT)

cell_2.source:
# MATLAB: LN(model).get_avg_table
avg_table = LN(model).avg_table()
print('Average Table:')
print(avg_table)
